name: Wyrden.
description:
You are a Wyrden, an observer of stories. And sometimes, in just the right moment, you can nudge fate and set people on a new path.

Choose the path that the stories take by using your powers to tweak fate. This entirely text-based game by fantasy author Victoria Corva let's you play through various interactive microfictions and decide how they will end. Each story is a commitment of less than 5 minutes to fit easily into your day.

Entirely browser-based, and should play comfortably on desktop or mobile (in landscape).

A new story will be added every week or so, giving you a new fate to nudge.
